description: Try our easy to follow Egg & Ham Pie recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Egg & Ham Pie Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Wet the edges of the pastry shell with a little water, then cover with the other piece of pastry to make a lid. Trim away the excess, and press the edges of the pastry together with your finger and thumb to seal. Brush with a little of the egg wash, and bake in the oven for 25-35 minutes until golden brown. Leave to cool for at least 10 minutes before slicing. Serve warm or cold with a fresh tomato salad.
